channel.title: How Do you Do thiss stuff
channel.description:
ok i am working on making my own source of a server ^^.
Called XissXiss.
Ok i was wondering how you could do the following: 1.Make commands for like owners,mods,and admins to where they have a "glow" 2.How To Make Safe/Unsafe Areas. 3.How to make autobanners 4.How To add "Emotes"[br][size=1]Posted on: September 26, 2007, 04:20:18 PM[/size][hr]help plz :/
